body:
Edit: This guild is locked into the Identity Politics category (I mean, it is indeed about identity politics. I don't know which category it was in before. Anyways, [apparently the admins will change the category of a guild (which I agree with) and lock it (not sure what to think of this...\*) if the GMs miscategorize it](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/66cv/instead-of-simply-uncategorizing-my-guild).)

\*Well, the admins did this to prevent the guildmasters from changing the category back over and over again, which I sort of understand. But others are also concerned about the admins being the ones to decide which category a guild belongs in.
body_html:
Edit: This guild is locked into the Identity Politics category (I mean, it is indeed about identity politics. I don't know which category it was in before. Anyways, apparently the admins will change the category of a guild (which I agree with) and lock it (not sure what to think of this...*) if the GMs miscategorize it.)

*Well, the admins did this to prevent the guildmasters from changing the category back over and over again, which I sort of understand. But others are also concerned about the admins being the ones to decide which category a guild belongs in.

guild.description:
Just videos of black people. Real footage that the media refuses to show and social media censors. Reddit,  and the rest of big tech regularly censor  videos that show "a POC as the aggressor". 

The goal of this Guild isn't hate porn or racism, but fighting back against censorship by showing the videos that nobody else will. 

- No pornography.

- Post whatever you want,  as long as it's a video of black people.

- Please don't editorialize headlines with your opinion,  let the video speak for itself. 

- please tag NSFW / NSFL appropriately.
guild.description_html:

  • please tag NSFW / NSFL appropriately.
guild.name: VidsofBlacks

body:
Yes (The mod log entries were recently added. They weren't there before), and I agree that this guild should be in the "identity politics" category because does indeed have a focus on race. I'm seeing that others are kind of concerned about category locking right now, most likely because some categories are still unchecked by default with no indicator on the All page. (I think that you're planning to make some changes to the way this works, right?) I think they're also worried that you may not choose the right categories (which would mean the guild is forced to be in a category that they believe is incorrect) or enforce this impartially. I currently don't really know what to think of it.

Anyways, may I ask when this guild, +HitlerWasRight, and any other guilds that have been category locked will no longer be category locked?

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Yes (The mod log entries were recently added. They weren't there before), and I agree that this guild should be in the "identity politics" category because does indeed have a focus on race. I'm seeing that others are kind of concerned about category locking right now, most likely because some categories are still unchecked by default with no indicator on the All page. (I think that you're planning to make some changes to the way this works, right?) I think they're also worried that you may not choose the right categories (which would mean the guild is forced to be in a category that they believe is incorrect) or enforce this impartially. I currently don't really know what to think of it.

Anyways, may I ask when this guild, +HitlerWasRight, and any other guilds that have been category locked will no longer be category locked?

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

author.bio:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

https://github.com/captainmeta4
author.bio_html:
Ruqqus cofounder and lead backend developer.

https://github.com/captainmeta4

body:
We have some ideas but we don't want to give away too much just yet.

Locking is done in response to deliberate miscategorization by guildmasters. Guilds can be un-category-locked if the actual content and goals of the guild shift away from the topic, such that the assigned category is no longer correct.
body_html:
We have some ideas but we don't want to give away too much just yet.

Locking is done in response to deliberate miscategorization by guildmasters. Guilds can be un-category-locked if the actual content and goals of the guild shift away from the topic, such that the assigned category is no longer correct.
